description: The Wasabi Power battery and charger kit includes 2 batteries and one charger with a European plug and car adapter. All items meet or exceed OEM standards and come with a 3-year manufacturer warranty.Batteries replace:Sony NP-BG1, NP-FG1Charger replaces:Sony BC-CSG, BC-CSGB, BC-CSGC, BC-TRGCompatible with the following Sony models:DSC-H3DSC-H7DSC-H9DSC-H10DSC-H20DSC-H50DSC-H55DSC-H70DSC-H90DSC-HX5VDSC-HX7VDSC-HX9VDSC-HX10VDSC-HX20VDSC-HX30VDSC-N1DSC-N2DSC-T20DSC-T100DSC-W30DSC-W35DSC-W50DSC-W55DSC-W70DSC-W80DSC-W90DSC-W100DSC-W120DSC-W130DSC-W150DSC-W170DSC-W200DSC-W210DSC-W215DSC-W220DSC-W230DSC-W270DSC-W290DSC-W300DSC-WX1DSC-WX10HDR-GW77V
